definitions.definition: Someone or something born or brought forth prematurely ; an abortion .
definitions.dating_raw: Attested from around (1150 to 1350) until the mid 18 century.
Attested from the early 17 century until the early 18 century.

definitions.definition: A medicine that causes abortion , an abortifacient .
A medicine or treatment acting to halt or slow the progress of a disease .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) Someone or something born or brought forth prematurely ; an abortion . [Attested from around (1150 to 1350) until the mid 18 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A fruitless effort. [Attested from the early 17 century until the early 18 century.]
( obsolete ) A medicine that causes abortion , an abortifacient .
( obsolete ) A medicine or treatment acting to halt or slow the progress of a disease .
